activities: Integration Point provides global trade management and compliance solutions to corporate clients.  Unless a client is operating as a sole proprietor, Integration Point would not typically provide such solutions to individuals.  Consequently, Personal Information that Integration Point receives from the EU is primarily in the form of contact or identifying information for either employees of an Integration Point client or a client’s customers, subcontractors, agents, trade partners, vendors, etc.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal Information transferred from the EU to Integration Point in the US, but excluding human resources information
